mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application ( id, app_type_code, is_payment_taken, payment_reference, submission_datetime, existing_badge_no, party_code, contact_name, contact_building_street, contact_line2, contact_town_city, contact_postcode, primary_phone_no, secondary_phone_no, contact_email_address, holder_name, org_is_charity, org_charity_no, no_of_badges, nino, dob, gender_code, holder_name_at_birth, eligibility_code, eligibility_conditions, benefit_is_indefinite, benefit_expiry_date, walk_other_desc, walk_length_code, walk_speed_code, arms_driving_freq, arms_is_adapted_vehicle, arms_adapted_veh_desc, blind_registered_at_la_code, local_authority_code, bulky_equipment_other_desc, application_status ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.util.UUID,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=uk.gov.dft.bluebadge.common.repository.UuidTypeHandler}, #{appTypeCode}, #{isPaymentTaken}, #{paymentReference}, #{submissionDatetime}, #{existingBadgeNo}, #{partyCode}, #{contactName}, #{contactBuildingStreet}, #{contactLine2}, #{contactTownCity}, #{contactPostcode}, #{primaryPhoneNo}, #{secondaryPhoneNo}, #{contactEmailAddress}, #{holderName}, #{orgIsCharity}, #{orgCharityNo}, #{noOfBadges}, #{nino}, #{dob}, #{genderCode}, #{holderNameAtBirth}, #{eligibilityCode}, #{eligibilityConditions}, #{benefitIsIndefinite}, #{benefitExpiryDate}, #{walkOtherDesc}, #{walkLengthCode}, #{walkSpeedCode}, #{armsDrivingFreq}, #{armsIsAdaptedVehicle}, #{armsAdaptedVehDesc}, #{blindRegisteredAtLaCode}, #{localAuthorityCode}, #{bulkyEquipmentOtherDesc}, #{applicationStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.id::VARCHAR string_id , a.local_authority_code , a.transfer_la_from_code , a.transfer_la_datetime , a.app_type_code , a.is_payment_taken , a.payment_reference , a.submission_datetime , a.existing_badge_no , a.party_code , a.contact_name , a.contact_building_street , a.contact_line2 , a.contact_town_city , a.contact_postcode , a.primary_phone_no , a.secondary_phone_no , a.contact_email_address , a.holder_name , a.org_is_charity , a.org_charity_no , a.no_of_badges , a.nino , a.dob , a.gender_code , a.holder_name_at_birth , a.eligibility_code , a.eligibility_conditions , a.benefit_is_indefinite , a.benefit_expiry_date , a.walk_other_desc , a.walk_length_code , a.walk_speed_code , a.arms_driving_freq , a.arms_is_adapted_vehicle , a.arms_adapted_veh_desc , a.blind_registered_at_la_code , a.bulky_equipment_type_code , a.bulky_equipment_other_desc , a.is_deleted , a.deleted_timestamp , a.application_status FROM application a WHERE a.id = #{uuid,javaType=java.util.UUID,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=uk.gov.dft.bluebadge.common.repository.UuidTypeHandler} AND a.is_deleted = #{deleted}
SELECT be.application_id , be.bulky_equipment_type_code FROM app_bulky_equipment_type be WHERE be.application_id::VARCHAR = #{id}

SELECT v.application_id , v.registration_no , v.type_code , v.usage_frequency FROM app_vehicle v WHERE v.application_id::VARCHAR = #{id}
SELECT t.application_id AS application_id , t.treatment_description , t.treatment_time FROM app_treatment t WHERE t.application_id::VARCHAR = #{id}
SELECT hp.application_id , hp.prof_name , hp.prof_location FROM app_healthcare_professional hp WHERE hp.application_id::VARCHAR = #{id}
SELECT med.application_id , med.med_name , med.med_is_prescribed , med.med_quantity , med.med_frequency FROM app_medication med WHERE med.application_id::VARCHAR = #{id}
SELECT art.application_id , art.artifact_type , art.link FROM app_artifact art WHERE art.application_id::VARCHAR = #{id}
